name: End Factory Farming
about: This is the about text of End Factory Farming.

sponsor.description: We will contribute an extra donation on top of yours, to the same value (up to $25 per donation). These matching funds are kindly provided by Every.org up to a total value of $10,000

nonprofits.name: The Human League
nonprofits.about: International nonprofit ending the abuse of animals raised for food.

nonprofits.name: Global Food Partners Inc
nonprofits.about: We work with businesses to implement and maintain high animal welfare and responsible sourcing policies.

nonprofits.name: Albert Schweitzer Foundation
nonprofits.about: The Albert Schweitzer Foundation works to eliminate cruel farming practices in Europe.

nonprofits.name: The Good Food Institute
nonprofits.about: We work with scientists, investors, and entrepreneurs to make groundbreaking good food a reality. We focus on clean meat and plant-based alternatives to animal productsâ€”foods that are more delicious, safer to eat, and better for the planet than their outdated counterparts.
